title: Brawn F1 car owned by Button to be sold at Miami this weekend
summary: A Brawn GP F1 car – one of just three, and once owned by Jenson Button – is going up for auction this weekend at the Miami GP

qa_pairs.question: Which F1 team did Jenson Button drive for when he won his first and only World Championship?
In what year did Brawn GP win the Constructors' Championship?
What is significant about the Brawn GP F1 car being auctioned?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is one of only three ever made.
wrong_options: It has won the Monaco GP
It was the first hybrid F1 car
It was driven by multiple champions
